dmca.title: Digital Millennium Copyright Act notification of copyright infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Igor Belous [mailto:belous@bimesoft.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, August 16, 2006 4:18 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Digital Millennium Copyright Act notification of copyright
infringement.
Subject: Digital Millennium Copyright Act notification of copyright
infringement.


Dear Sir/Madam,

It has come to our attention that a web site
http://english.p30world.com/ contains our copyrighted materials thus
infringing upon our copyright.
The web site is hosted on your server. We request you to take
appropriate actions to disable access to the infringing materials
described below in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
of 1998.

1.  The materials that belong to our company and appear illegally at the
web site are the following:
SurfOffline computer program
http://english.p30world.com/archives/001878.php
and
http://english.p30world.com/archives/2005_01.php

These materials are used without our permission  in violation of the
License Terms (see http://www.bimesoft.com/License.txt) and copyright
laws.
2.  Original works are located at http://www.surfoffline.com/,
http://www.bimesoft.com/ and
http://www.bimesoft.com/downloads/SurfOfflineSetup.exe
3.  Infringing works are located at the following web pages:
    http://english.p30world.com/archives/001878.php
    and
    http://english.p30world.com/archives/2005_01.php
4. The SurfOffline copyrighted article is illegally copied.
 Therefore, the actions of the user violate our copyright under  the
United States  law. We expect that you will promptly disable the
infringing materials  in accordance with  the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act of 1998.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the materials that appear at
the web site is not authorized by the copyright owner.

The information in this notice is accurate, I am authorized to act on
behalf of the copyright owner.   

I declare under the perjury laws of the United States of America that
this notification is true and correct.  

If you need additional information on the matter do not hesitate to
contact us.

Our contact details are as follows:
